name.description: The name of the cluster. This field is required.

clientId.description: The client ID for Jit. This field is required when not using an existing secret.

clientSecret.description: The client secret for Jit. This field is required when not using an existing secret.

existingSecret.description: The name of an existing secret to use for Jit credentials. If provided, clientId and clientSecret will be ignored.

jit.description: Jit authentication requires either: 1) Both 'clientId' and 'clientSecret' for direct authentication, or 2) 'existingSecret' to reference an existing Kubernetes secret containing the credentials.
